EmailTemplate.name: ASI TnE TW Completed Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: T&E Claim for {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.ASI_TnE_Payee_Employee__c} has been completed (#{!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.OwnerFullName},
Your Travel & Entertainment Claim form {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} has been completed. 您的差旅費申請單{!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name}已完成
Please click this link {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} to view the Travel & Entertainment form details. 請按此 {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} 連結 檢閱差旅費申請單明細
